column6: Where were you when the Stars returned? Planet Terry! Wally Wizard! Royal Roy! All in this issue. Plus: X-Babies in space and X-Babies versus...The Alpha-Bot!! Punching, Clawing, Blasting, Bamfing, Dancing, Magic and more...ALL in 32 fun-filled pages! Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Jacob Chabot | writer:Gregg Schigiel | colorist:Emily Warren | colorist:Skottie Young
